item.title: Weekly Review #57 - Life Elsewhere (Bali Trip)
item.description: 'Fix You - Coldplay' Preface This piece is a record and reflection of my life from 2024-04-01 to 2024-04-10. As I put pen to paper, it’s already late May. Unknowingly, two months have slipped by. It’s not just the weekly review updates; the multitude of recent events seems to have made it difficult for me to extricate myself from my entire life. But without realizing it myself, this weekly review, a vessel for recording life, has already become a part of me.
